tool_description: Natural Language User Interface to Database API, which allows End Users to request information from database using only Natural Language
name: Natural Language to SQL
title: Natural Language to SQL

api_list.name: Natural Language User Interface to Database API
api_list.description: Responds with SQL script based on SAP database and text reply to End User for Natural Language question
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://natural-language-to-sql.p.rapidapi.com/demo_sap"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "natural-language-to-sql.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://natural-language-to-sql.p.rapidapi.com/demo_sap"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "natural-language-to-sql.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
